Topic: Linxon commissions Nepal's first 400-kV GIS substation at Dhalkebar
Statement:
New Delhi^ Feb 12 (PTI) Engineering firm Linxon on Friday said it has successfully commissioned Nepal's first 400-kilovolt gas insulated substation at Dhalkebar.
